content.raw: I normally run the apps for trade shows and such, The app  crashes when i try to connect. I can see the robot when i scan and have configurations that are known to work with tablets and robots that have worked in the past. (i have 9 turtlebots that i manage for a robotics program at WPI) I have tried 3 diffrent name brand tablets on groovy and hydro with appropriately installed turtle bots. and in all configurations the APP crashes when it trys to connect. Next book, motorolla xoom and a nexus 7 tablets have failed. I have tried the manual config and the scan network function with the same results. i even used the qr codes to no avail.  joest@wpi.edu  I am currently installing the android sdk to receive the debug info.
